item.title: The lifebuoy basics of Windows 10
item.description: In this class learn how to navigate and understand the workings of the different areas of your desktop. Running Time (Approx): 2hrs Location: Share Space 533 5th Street Santa Rosa, CA 95401 Start Date/Time: June 2st 2018 - 12pm Special Instructions: The front door to share space is locked, please arrive on time, We will wait by the door until 12:15pm to let in people that are running late. Once the class starts at 12:15 you may not be able to get in.
